channel.title: 640 Sprite Dump
channel.description:
Hi.
so i thought i would release here and see how it goes. Swat did ask me to dump sprites awhile ago but i couldnt be assed with RSPS.
This dump is from the latest cache that was released on 02.03.2011.
Link: [url=http://uppit.com/y6ci83xndqgi/Sprites_Dumped_on_03.03.11.rar]UppIT - Free File Sharing - Sprites Dumped on 03.03.11.rar[/url]
And yes this does contain all sprites within the cache, and yes it has the new lobby sprites.
(Yes i am Lord Sean/Sir Sean from r-s)

item.title: 640 Sprite Dump
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:386004”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=481755.msg3533836#msg3533836 date=1300404138]

Lobby sprites, you are clearly misguided.

Are you like retarded or something? jus asking

EDIT:

OT - Thanks for this. I needed :]

I’m guessing thats why you’ve been derepped so much, carrying on something that doesn’t need to be.
[/quote]
Don’t care that I have been “derepped so much” (2 has become alot?), and it looks like you are the one carrying on this argument by opening it up again (as Vain said). Besides,this entire thing could have been avoided in the first place if he would have corrected me (as i said lobster, so I knew what I ment), and he could have told me it was the Login Lobby sprites.[/quote]

Kaex wasn’t talking to you sweetheart

Read full topic

Sprites are images, and last time I checked the client uses models for lobster and other items. Either that has changed (doubtedly) or you are all misguided.
